import {Card, Button, Table} from "react-bootstrap"; import { useState , useEffect } from "react"; import { Link, useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; const Profile = (props) => { const [email, setEmail] = useState(props.currentUser); const [users, setUsers] = useState( localStorage.getItem("posts") ? JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("posts")) : [] ); const name = users.find() const navigate = useNavigate(); useEffect(() => { if (props.loginStatus !== true) { navigate("/"); } }, []); return Profile
Name
{name}
Email
{email}
} export default Profile;
